channel.title: Programming Language on MMbros
channel.description: Recent content in Programming Language on MMbros

item.title: Node.js
item.author: server.mmbros@yandex.com (MMbros)
item.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js’ package ecosystem, npm, is the largest ecosystem of open source libraries in the world.

item.title: The Go Programming Language
item.author: server.mmbros@yandex.com (MMbros)
item.description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software golang.org wikipedia.en Installation Install to a custom location and workspace setup: GOROOT: $HOME/local/go GOPATH: $HOME/Code/go For full install instruction see Getting Started. Download the archive and extract the archive into the destination folder. For example extract the archive into $HOME/local, creating a Go tree in $HOME/local/go: tar -C $HOME/local -xzf go$VERSION.
